department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: This course introduces the basic knowledge of computer organization, including performance evaluation, instruction designs, digital logic, data path and the related hardware issues. The course materials can help to develop students‘ logic/designing abilities and equip students with the fundamentals of computer software/hardware interfaces. The content will help students to take such advanced course computer architectures.
goal.ch: 本課程主要介紹計算機架構的基本知識，包括效能評估、指令集設計、數位邏輯、資料流架構與相關硬體設計等議題。課程內容可培養學生邏輯與設計能力的養成，讓學生對計算機組織與架構具備基本的認知與了解，將來可進一步修習計算機結構等進階課程。

content.en:
Evaluating the performance of a system
Capabilities of the main components of a CPU and a memory system
How the main components are inter-connected
Information flow between the components
How to control the information flow
Emerging memory architecture
Design principles of an elegant system
